comments:
When stepping through the tutorial 
  "Bottom up Web Service supporting flexible projects"
I sometimes get an NPE when clicking 'Finish' on wizard page 
  "Service Deployment Configuration".
The exception does not occur deterministically so I assume a timing problem.

I exactly followed the outlined steps from the tutorial. I imported the file
wtp/Converter.java either through FileSystem Wizard or by manual file copy &
refresh on the project. The latter made no difference.

My environment:
o WTP 1.0M4
o Windows XP
o both tomcat 5.0.30 and 5.0.28
o both jdk 1.4.2_08 and 1.4.2_07 for running Eclipse and tomcat

Sometimes when stepping through the tutorial other exceptions than the one below
occured instead when clicking 'Finish'. Maybe they have something in common with
this one. The other exceptions are posted in
http://dev.eclipse.org/newslists/news.eclipse.webtools/msg04129.html

-------------------------------------
